pullrequest.title: Added the ability for analysis scripts to register a custom Plot class

content.raw:
Thanks for the feedback, I’ve fixed the things you’ve raised!

In further testing I’ve fixed a bunch of other things to do with how we manage figures, in order to bring the behaviour more in line with how you would expect it to behave when used from a terminal. A description of everything I’ve changed in in the last commit message \(there is also some more in the one before that if you haven’t seen it…can’t remember how much Bitbucket includes in email notifications\). You might want to look over it to make sure it doesn’t break any of your original intentions.

I’ll be merging Monday or Tuesday I think unless Shaun needs it merged sooner.
content.html:
Thanks for the feedback, I’ve fixed the things you’ve raised!

In further testing I’ve fixed a bunch of other things to do with how we manage figures, in order to bring the behaviour more in line with how you would expect it to behave when used from a terminal. A description of everything I’ve changed in in the last commit message (there is also some more in the one before that if you haven’t seen it…can’t remember how much Bitbucket includes in email notifications). You might want to look over it to make sure it doesn’t break any of your original intentions.

I’ll be merging Monday or Tuesday I think unless Shaun needs it merged sooner.
